New Records: Kyle Isbel scored on a throwing error, ending a 27-inning scoreless streak for the Royals
Key Match Events: Royals won on a 10th-inning throwing error
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Matt Quatraro highlighted the victory as pivotal for their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Royals held onto the second AL wild-card spot; tiebreaker with Detroit
Others: Hunter Harvey and James McArthur out for the season; Michael Lorenzen set to return; next matchup details
